Title: Yume no Tochuu de
Description: ['A song about the softness you feel when you dream. Like an old friend or family, it is inviting no matter how much you struggle when you are awake.']
Related: ['Prequel: Zhiqu Yang Xuetang: Yangyang You Shijie', 'Sequel: Zhiqu Yang Xuetang: Yangyang Lai Yunbao']
